page.title: 05SCHOOLS-HANDCROSS PARK
page.content: Handcross Park is a private school.It has 120 boys and 60 girls aged 7-13.The main house contains the dining hall,recreation rooms and library.There is a swimming pool.A school service is held on Sundays,they have prayers each morning.The younger boys and the girls sleep in dormitories.The older boys sleep in a seperate building called "The Annexe". They are supervised by a housemaster. Games are taken seriously and the children play netball and football and they do horse riding. In the summer the girls play rounders, and the boys play cricket and rounders.
